desc: VoIP and convergence are hot topics, and the CVOICE 8.0 exam targets candidates looking to pass Exam 642-437 and pursue their CCNP Voice certification. Companies continue to add VoIP service at a record pace, and network administrators are ramping up their skills. This new member of the Sybex Study Guide series covers everything youâ€™ll need to know to pass the certification exam.
title: CVOICE 8.0, with CD: Implementing Cisco Unified Communications Voice over IP and QoS v8.0 (Exam 642-437)
